The only woman that can beat Ronda Rousey is Daenerys Targaryen... jus sayin

Just like Mo'ne Davis, all of the attention and movies etc.... Yes, I enjoy watching MMA fighting and especially Rousey, but ESPN doesn't need to be sugar coating Rousy all the time.. Another reason why I don't watch ESPN anymore.
If ESPN could stop posting about Ronda Rousey.... That'd be great.

Sorry but you can't be the best fighter in the world if there's a fighter who has been undefeated for ten years only ten pounds above you.... Dana wont let her fight up to 145 so Cyborg is trying to drop down weight after this fight she has at 140... She's coming for Ronda and I can't wait for that fight... That's a superfight right there..
Until she beats cyborg. She hasnt beat "every competition"
Terrible actor, great fighter but terrible actor lol

Lebrons still on holiday. Rousey it is

After an exchange of hit batsmen, the Kansas City Royals and Toronto Blue Jays are taking their feud online:
There's no crying in baseball Blue Jays....
I don't know why jays are mad there pitchers hit the KC batters more in the series. Stay classy Toronto!!

Hey!  No Royals ejected!  Player and manager ejected from Toronto.  Let's lay the blame where it should be.  Umps got this right.
It's always the royals..
I â™¡ toronto blue jays<3;-)

These idiots at ESPN have no clue about baseball.  Blue Jays hitters are hanging over the plate,  they were mashing the ball over the fence because Royal pitchers were pitching towards there strength they decide to pitch inside to back them off the plate they start whining like little babies

I blame this on the umpire.  He issues warnings and then three pitches were up and in on Jays players with no ejections.  What are they supposed to do.  At least the Jays pitcher didn't throw at anyone's head.
As a Royals fan it's embarrassing.  Especially Ventura.  Would still be in Omaha if Vargas didn't get hurt.  Do your talking on the field

Teams in the AL are mad because these aren't the same Royals that would lose 100 games every year. 
Royals don't have to let other teams walk over them or be sorry that they're having success now. You don't like it, beat them on the field & let the win speak for itself. Let's Go Royals
Kc royals are classless. Their my al team too. Or at least they used to be. Idk. I'm gonna have to rethink that.
This all started because the Blue Jays hit Moustakas in the knee and he hasn't played for a couple games.
Yordano Ventura is a punk. He should be banned from baseball until he learns to shut his big mouth.
Overpaid babies. It's no wonder I lost interest in baseball.

You're both irrelevant til you do something. Save the pissing contest for the post season...

They should give us a view on which city Toronto or KC has the biggest bandwagon fans.

Lets name a team that like the Royals.

"I don't feel no one can stop me. You can get Darelle Revis, Richard Sherman -- whoever you want to get."

-DeSean Jackson, at Washington Redskins training camp:
That's a double negative, so someone can stop you.
RGIII is all he needs to be stopped..
Technically DeSean Jackson said that people can stop him.  Double negative. "I [do not] feel no one can stop me."  Somebody should don't not get him some hooked on phonics.
No, he said Darelle Revis, Richard Sherman, and maybe even a few others, could stop him.
IDesean Jackson is the only person that can make desean Jackson ruin a TD and fumble on the 1 yard line.

You play for the redskins and your QB is RGIII   LOL your stopped before starting.
He already put the burners on Richard Sherman last season for a TD and I'm sure he can get pass Revis too a better match up is a corners with speed like P Petterson or V Davis
Revis Sherman Peterson Grimes. Ya I think those guys can stop him
That's actually a very humble statement coming from he. What a nice guy to say that Sherman and Revis could guard him.
Richard Sherman doesn't cover #1 receivers so he will never stop him
RGIII can stop you,lol.

He's a "ME" player, which is what got him and McCoy run out of Philly. He's fast. He's a threat to score every time he has the ball. Not denying that. He's one of the top deep threats in the league and we all know that he'd have better numbers on a high-powered offensive team with a stud QB. But he's not even a top 15 WR, much less the invincible football God that HE thinks he is.
Does he remember he plays for the Redskins now?
Richard Sherman would stop you before you even stepped on the field.
Dude you can barley handle Orlando Schandrick from the Cowboys what makes you think you can handle revis. I believe you could do that to Sherman but not revis bro
He's not even a top 10 WR and he's trash talking wow
Ha, no one needs to stop a receiver that plays with a trash qb.
U gotta have a QB lmao
